description: TO ELECT THE SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE.  VOTES FOR RAINEY (DEM) ARE CODED 1; VOTES FOR SNELL (REP) ARE CODED 2; VOTES FOR KVALE(FL) ARE CODED 5.
Issue1: Election of the Speaker of the House
